duties_responsibilities.duty: Collaborate with the management team to supervise store operations and create an engaging environment for customers and the team.
Drive sales, build awareness of key metrics, and contribute to the development of team members.
Act as a brand ambassador, creating selling initiatives, and delivering a seamless omni-channel shopping experience.
Exercise decision-making and multitasking capabilities, prioritize service over tasks, and actively participate in managing the store environment and customer experience.
Support the store management team in executing daily office procedures, operations, and store maintenance.
Engage employees at all levels, promote open dialogue, reinforce follow-through, and ensure that the store team is heard and supported.
Stay current and collaborate with the leadership team, respond to communication, and actively participate in daily meetings and chat ins.
Guide and develop the Stylist team, take responsibility for own development and professional growth, and consider role replacement for career progression.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or equivalent (Bachelor's degree preferred)
